testcase.name: Create a new user in buildxact application
testcase.system-out: Given I launch "Chrome" browser session.....................................passed When I navigate to Buildxact application....................................passed And I login to Buildxact application as per "TestCase1".....................passed Then I verify if the login is successful or not.............................passed Then I navigate to My Business and fill and submit the new user form as per "TestCase1".passed And I logout from Buildxact application.....................................passed Then I navigate to the user's mailbox, open the Welcome mail, activate the user account as per "TestCase1".passed And I verify if the login is successful or not..............................passed
